main.name: Vincent Tran
main.bio: Software Development Engineer at Amazon with over 3 years of experience in software development, focusing on backend and cloud services. Skilled in building serverless systems, scaling container environments, and ensuring high-performance applications.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.description: Help developed an application that quantified trucker's recklessness based off of dashcam videos and real-time sensor log.
